WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex issues and suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some issues and feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description:
the production in the PDF is as follows:

     RestParameter: ... RequiredParameter

except the ... has spaces seperating the dots so that when you search for ... you don't find this text.

Secondly the text could helpfully use any standard term for supporting functions with variable arguments e..g varargs, variable argument lists, something so that this was easier to find.   This 'rest' parameter thing was not one of my searches in any case.  I had to dig into someone's definitions file to find something that was clearly variable length and then dig into the spec to see why just searching for ... didn't work.

Further it doesn't help that the spec also uses ... for 'we're adding a production to the javscript grammar'.

Comments.Message: Luke - please check for prettified ellipsis in spec.
